title: Visual Studio 2015 and LINQ
eventShortDescription:
Come and hear Adam Cogan and Eric Phan present Visual Studio 2015 and LINQ

LINQ is the future of ORM on the .NET platform and with the release of Visual Studio 2015 only months away it will become mainstream. In this presentation you will learn about the different types of LINQ and how to use LINQ to quickly build data-driven applications.​​
